name: Thousands Participate in County’s Love Your Heart
description: The County of San Diego’s Love Your Heart is a one-day, annual event in which organizations from across the U.S. and Mexico join together to provide free blood pressure screenings to the public on Valentine’s Day.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
The County of San Diego’s Love Your Heart is a one-day, annual event in which organizations from across the U.S. and Mexico join together to provide free blood pressure screenings to the public on Valentine’s Day.
Last year’s event helped over 43,000 people get to know their blood pressure numbers and take charge of their own heart health.
